message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Can you consider my offer?
